column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Great Ramen! First timer but it was very delicious. We ordered the 5 piece chicken as an appetizer
column2: but it wasnt anything special. Just fried chicken. We then ordered the Spicy (mild) Chicken Ramen. Its not spicy at all! We ended up adding hot sauce to it :)) Great place
column3: great experience. The only downside is the wait time
